html: 4.23.17  7:44 pm   On the questions page, why is the q in questions in between the e and the s?

4.23.17  7:43 pm   Why did you delete your last song ?

     i did not

4.23.17  7:29 pm   how do you achieve happyness

     do you remember how you did it last time

4.23.17  7:28 pm   Is love real

     yes, and fake

4.23.17  7:22 pm   When will you stop global warming?

     as soon as i can
4.23.17  6:55 pm   I'm really interested in the history of Japan and I was woundering if you could make a video about it

4.23.17  5:22 pm   I love the way you thinking. I mean - your mindset in general, as I feel it. It means you're thinking deeply critical, trying to get into the sense, the point of something, rather than evaluating something as you see it and marking stupid "evaluation", like most of people do. And how you've started thinking this way?

     i'm just trying to be reasonable

      Did your notebook helped you?

     the notebook is just a place to post some things i have written

      And why you even published your notes publicly? :D

     to be viewable, by people like you

4.23.17  5:19 pm   On a scale of 1-10?

     no

4.23.17  4:35 pm   Do you say the words "New world" in the new video? Do you put extra emphasis on the word "new"?

     no

4.23.17  4:09 pm   Is past you the same person as future you?

     yes

4.23.17  3:41 pm   why did you make so many songs

     i dunno but i still haven't made most of them

4.23.17  3:17 pm   do you have a process for mixing and/or mastering your audio/songs? or is each thing impossibly different?

     the trick is to not do anything, unless something needs to be done. like, listen to it, and then you're like 'oh no, this is way too much louder than that, let me even it out.' etc. that's about it

4.23.17  2:35 pm   How do i begin an adventure

     the first part of the advanture is figuring out the adventure. it looks like your adventure has already begun

4.23.17  2:25 pm   what are some things you arent interested in

     i feel like i mention things i am not interested all the time on these questions pages

4.23.17  1:13 pm   how much of your time a day do you spend making your videos and how much doing other stuff

     i spend as much time as possible working on the current project. this is to ensure that i can move onto the next project as soon as possible
4.23.17  1:06 pm   whats the password to the reality page

4.23.17  1:03 pm   why do i feel weirdly connected to your content if the question mark represents the ear in order to hear the answer does it make any sense in written language

     written language is largely a representation of spoken language
4.23.17  1:00 pm   why are you answering these questions do you think your time is worth less the satisfaction i get from your answer if so why

4.23.17  12:57 pm   are you happy with your life?

     almost

4.23.17  12:56 pm   Bill, I just calculated you have 77045 total spaces in all sections of your website (including anagrams and excluding the ones that take you to another website, not www.billwurtz.com)! How do you feel about that?

     i feel like you are a very diligent and focused person

4.23.17  12:47 pm   why are working on your content non-stop

     because the list of content yet to be made is insane

4.23.17  12:43 pm   how many different people have ever asked a question here

     i don't know

4.23.17  12:43 pm   if you could study anything, what would u ? study?

     everything

4.23.17  12:34 pm   is "bill wurtz" a character or do you actually talk and act and think like this on a day to day basis when you are, for example, talking to ur friends and family? you know what I mean, right? like the whole "aloof, wise, humble, quiet, inoffensive" thing?

4.23.17  12:13 pm   You know what?

     yes, or perhaps i guess
4.23.17  11:55 am   Why do you answer all your questions at like midnight?
4.23.17  11:06 am   Its been really long since you uploaded something on youtube. When will your next video come?

4.23.17  10:36 am   How would you make videos of you were colorblind? Would they be in grayscale? Or would they look the same since -- do you pick then randomly already?

     i would continue to use words, sounds, patterns, and timing, to the fullest. oh i almost forgot MUSIC

4.23.17  10:21 am   Is it possible to have one question get two or more hyperlinks?

     yes

4.23.17  10:17 am   Are time and space the hot lava

     i think time and space are usually the escape route from the lava

4.23.17  10:14 am   you have a lot of stuff planned for after the video (the song schedule, updating reality, fixing the catagories, etc) but whats the first First thing you gotta do

     take a nap

4.23.17  7:49 am   What's the point of selecting a small percentage of questions, only to then give non-answers like "i dont know" "im not sure" "i will check" to so many of them? Wouldn't you be better off ignoring questions you don't know the answer to and focus on those you do?

      i try to choose and answer questions in a way that i think has meaning

4.23.17  7:48 am   please do a youtube thank

     i already have one
4.23.17  7:33 am   are you

4.23.17  7:05 am   what is better: better or best?

     i'd say they are both pretty good

4.23.17  6:52 am   i'm really looking forward to the new songs that are coming out after the long video :) will they mostly be stuff that you already wrote a while a go (that are on that huge ass list you made a few years ago (i forgot when))? or also things you wrote more recently? or are you going to write and record entirely new songs?

     it should be a smooth merging of both

4.23.17  6:49 am   when you finish the hotewig video are you going to do more things like chill and go random places or will you always be working on content for the rest of your life?

     there is still a lot of doors left to open. i will try to navigate through them swiftly, in a way that makes sense

4.23.17  6:12 am   why are roses red and violets blue

     why wouldn't they be

4.23.17  5:41 am   Can you visualize a really complicated song all in your head without having to play it out to see if it sound right?

     not visualize, but i imagine the sound
4.23.17  5:00 am   how do you "take advantage" of your loneliness? (asking for a friend)

4.23.17  4:46 am   why did the "History of Japan" video got 24 million views

     perhaps only the viewers know

4.23.17  3:23 am   will you be sad?

     i will have mixed emotions, and feelings, over the long term

4.23.17  3:23 am   Were there no submissions sent at 4:20 on 4/20 or did you just ignore them?

     i don't remember
4.23.17  3:23 am   why do you bother answering questions? I mean you could be working on the video faster if you stopped doing this.
4.23.17  3:19 am   Who are some people that you wish to collaborate with?

4.23.17  3:09 am   Why are the jingles taking much longer than on history of japan?

     why do you think they are

4.23.17  2:25 am   History teacher here, do you plan on making more country-specific history videos? My 10th graders really enjoyed the Japan one :)

     i would prefer to do a wider range of different types of videos. there are still a lot of stones left to turn

4.23.17  1:49 am   Hey man, you are my friend. Whatever happened to that one stack of books you made though? It had detergent on it and everything!

     you were not there. i had to make it myself

4.23.17  1:48 am   Do you know what Dungeons & Dragons is? Have you played Dungeons & Dragons? Did you enjoy Dungeons & Dragons?

     dragons, not dungeons

4.23.17  1:25 am   do you like puns?

     i hope knot
